chapters.chapter_name: Compiler language vs Interpreter language vs jit

topics.topic_html:
Compiler language converts the code to machine code which are 0 and 1 directly. It is faster but it has slower conversion rate. It is more hardware specific

canvas^^https://wbo.ophir.dev/boards/emon-art-9402615809
  • Compiler code is  faster in run time
  • It has slower conversion rate
  • C++, Java are compiler language

Interpreter language converts the code to bytecode after that bytecode gets translated into machine code. byte code is in the middle of english language and  machine language. Its conversion rate is fast but has a slower runtime compiler to compiler language

canvas ^^https://wbo.ophir.dev/boards/emon-art-2823039290
  • It has faster conversion
  • It has slower runtime 
  • javascript is a interpreter language
Jit compiler is special compiler which has faster conversion rate like interpreter and faster run time like compiler language

alert is a function that shows pop up alert in the browser. alert is a part of the browser, it is not a part of the javascript language. Via javascript language we can use the alert function

alert("Hello World");

Console can be written in three ways

  • console.log()
  • console.warn()
  • console.error()

Shortcut ways to write consoles

  • cl -> console.log()
  • cwa-> console.warn()
  • cer -> console.error()
console.log("Hello World");
console.warn("Hello World");
console.error("Hello World");

Prompt is nothing but a leveled up version of alert. In prompt there is alert with a input field where you can give a input. Prompt is also a part of the browser, it's not part of javascript language

prompt("What is your name");
